title: Narwal’s 2-in-1 robot vacuum and mop takes the work out of cleaning the house – get $150 off now
content:
Robot vacuums have been around for a while, with the ability to quickly and easily clean dust and pet hair around your home automatically, but true cleaning requires more. That’s where the Narwal T10 steps in, with a 2-in-1 design that can vacuum the floors and then run a mopping cycle. Here’s how you can save on this useful robot.

more…

The post Narwal’s 2-in-1 robot vacuum and mop takes the work out of cleaning the house – get $150 off now appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Narwal T10 isn't your average robot vacuum, with the ability to mop your home for a deep clean, and we've got a big discount to share.
